text:
Serenity small park, very clean. Check out the big tree as well, amazing. Visit in the early morning or late afternoon.

7 minutes walk to Nicole Highway MRT station. Nearby got food centre and community centre.
Love the ambience, and thereâ€™s a lot of birds here. So peaceful and located in the heart of Singapore

Kampong Glam Park is a small serene park fronting Masjid Hajjah Fatimah.
The name "Glam" was derived from Gelam Tree.
Kampong Glam was once a Arab Muslim community enclave.
The quiet Park offers an escape from the surrounding burstling city life.
Not much to see here but it has some nice areas to sit with lunch or coffee or something.
A park in the bustling city area  provides greenery that good for a relaxation walk after a day work.
